patterns: What kinds of services do you have?
responses: We provide services in all stages of the Software Development Life Cycle including planning, design, development, deployment, and maintenance
Our services include the planning, design, development, deployment, and maintenance of Software applications
Nous fournissons des services a toutes les etapes du cycle de vie du developpement de logiciel, y compris la planification, la conception, le developpement, le deploiement et la maintenance.
Nos services comprennent la planification, la conception, le developpement, le deploiement et la maintenance d'applications de logicielles.
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal
Nous acceptons VISA, Mastercard et PayPal
Nous acceptons la plupart des principales cartes de credit et PayPal
